title: Grateful Dead Live at Stanley Theater on 1981-03-06
source: Recording by Jim Wise: Master Audience Cassette; 2 Sennheiser 421s> Sony D-5 Center Loge; Transfer and FLAC encoding by David Minches: April 2014; Dolby B decoded Master played back on Nakamichi Dragon > Korg MR-1000(DSF [1-bit 5.6448 MHz Stereo]); Korg AudioGate > WAV [24/96] > Adobe Audition 3.0> FLAC encoding (24/96 version)
